Text: I created this torrent for other people who have no idea what program plays .flac files. I downloaded that torrent and then converted them all to .mp3 and created this torrent. I feel okay downloading this album even though they are a small band because I have bought multiple $30 concert tickets to go see them live and support them. If you don't go see them in concert, you should buy the cd off their website or on itunes so that they are able to continue making music.
